The proposed amendments include the following:

* '''''(Article 75)''''': Require the president to be an Egyptian, and says a candidate would be ineligible if he or she had dual nationality, parents who were citizens of countries other than Egypt or married to a non-Egyptian.
+
* '''''(Article 75)''''': A candidate would be ineligible if he or she had dual nationality, parents who were citizens of countries other than Egypt or married to a non-Egyptian.
* '''''(Article 76)''''': Easing the requirements for being a presidential candidate.
* '''''(Article 76)''''': Easing the requirements for being a presidential candidate.
* '''''(Article 77)''''': Limiting the terms a president can serve to two consecutive terms, each 4 years only.
* '''''(Article 77)''''': Limiting the terms a president can serve to two consecutive terms, each 4 years only.
